alert.note: Alert for Thomas (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 13 at 4:10PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Jefferson, eastern Leon and southeastern Thomas Counties through 445 PM EDT... At 410 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 9 miles northwest of Monticello to 13 miles northeast of Woodville. Movement was east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Monticello, Alma, Fincher, Cody, Dills, Festus, Lamont, Baum, Capps, Lois, Everett, Nash, Miccosukee, Thomas City, Drifton, Capitola, St. Marks Headwaters Greenway, Casa Blanco, Jarrott and Waukeenah. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
